about_the_game:
Nuumonsters is a game set in the future about curious little creatures that strive to be the strongest^^ Power on your AR Gear and play the role of Yasaka or Yana to become the highest ranking battler in the region!

Explore a bustling open world setting with several towns and routes filled with monsters, characters, items, and hidden bases! Defeat Elite trainers to unlock new areas and continue on your journey. With a total of 80 monsters and 100+ moves, players have a lot of teambuilding options to indulge in as they level up their favorite monsters to take on enemy trainers with.

Frequent updates include special event monsters only available for a limited time, map additions, new monsters and sounds, and general gameplay improvements.



Current features include:
- Customizable home base
- Unlockable fishing and boating routes
- Beautiful full piano 12 track OST
- 7 towns and 12 routes and areas to explore
- 80+ Monsters to find, capture, and train
- 3 color palette with 15+ alt palettes to choose from

Future updates will work towards the following features:
• Online battling, trading, co-op, and an MMR ranking system
• 144 unique monsters and even more moves
• General expansions to the world map
• Combat system upgrades and additions
• In-game events to unlock rare Monsters

Explore a bustling open world setting with several towns and routes filled with monsters, characters, items, and hidden bases! Defeat Elite trainers to unlock new areas and continue on your journey. With a total of 80 monsters and 100+ moves, players have a lot of teambuilding options to indulge in as they level up their favorite monsters to take on enemy trainers with.

Frequent updates include special event monsters only available for a limited time, map additions, new monsters and sounds, and general gameplay improvements.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mavericks (OSX 10.9) OS or above
  • Processor: Dual core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Sierra (OSX 10.12) OS or above
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Nuumonsters
